name: Purrfect Tale
description:
This story is told through interactive comics. You'll need to consider and make your choices to progress. What will you do when the cat you take in turns into a human? What kind of outfit will you wear for your spring outing...?
Each interaction will give you a chance to better understand your cat-eared youth. Each time you try your best, you'll have a chance to get one step closer to your dream. Each action you take will impact the continuation of the story. So, what kind of choices will you make?

Roles


  • Oliver

You met him for the first time in an alley at sunset.
The urban legend became a reality before your eyes as the cat transformed into a youth. Despite his difficult past, he remains gentle and kind. The meticulous and tenacious cat-eared youth entered your boring and routine life, giving you the courage to firmly chase after your dreams.
No matter how far you stray, he will always be right behind you when you turn back.
He watches over you and shines because of you. He's the one who hopes to be by your side as you chase after your dreams.

  • Mo

You always seem to be in a pathetic state whenever you meet him.
In a crowded elevator, on a dangerous night, and at a noisy dinner... Whenever you're about to drown under the pressure, he never fails to lend you a helping hand, escaping the scene together with you.
A young and capable CEO, a steely elite who does not smile... The labels on him that seem to run parallel to you are disproved one after another by him. Behind his quiet nature is his silent concern for you and beneath his perfection lies his childish side. Behind his enviable life, there are also the frustrations and disappointments of unrealized dreams...
He shows you a different side of the world, but also sees the different possibilities of life because of you. He's the one who saves you, but also finds solace and comfort in you.

Tale

Four acts currently updated. They describe the coming-of-age story of a girl and her cats.


  • Act 1
The sour and bitter taste of biting into a nearly ripe green apple reminds you of your unrealized dreams and how you've been forgotten by the world.
When the dam holding back your emotions and grievances gives way, meeting the special cat-eared youth and having his company seem to dispel all feelings of bitterness...

  • Act 2
You enjoy freedom in the ivory tower of college life, pursuing a major in art where your passion lies, and having two like-minded friends. Your future seems full of unlimited possibilities.
Alas, all good things must come to an end. Work, rent, social circle, and all sorts of crises loom over you. You also notice the firm pair of hands that keeps you afloat amid these crises... His appearance gradually becomes clearer...

  • Act 3
Now, life is on the right track. You have a stable job, friends you're regularly in contact with, and a special family.
The lives of these cats are not carefree either. They, too, face problems in their lives, have dreams they cannot seem to achieve, and have people they miss but are no longer able to see... As their family, you wish to gradually undo each one of their emotional knots.

  • Act 4
Backed by your dreams and family, you bravely embark on a new phase in life.
Quitting the job that makes you unhappy, you start doing the things that you really want to do. But the world is somehow full of outlandish malice. Being accused and facing setbacks smothered your burning passion like a sudden downpour in the summer.
Thankfully, you still have them and him, the one you share a close yet undefined bond with... What awaits you after this junction?

Subsequent chapters to be continued... Your story with them will continue...
